Hotels on Jumeirah Beach Walk - Mark a Delightful Stay for Guests Hotels on Jumeirah Beach Walk - Mark a Delightful Stay for Guests 0 
Jumeirah which literally translates into "beautiful" is a popular coastal residential area of Dubai, comprising mainly low rise private dwellings and a rich medley of architectural style and expensive, independent properties as well as more modest dwellings, reflects largely, a western expatriate population. Home to the Emirati population of pearl divers, fishermen and traders in days of yore, it's beachfront area, with the gaily coloured shops selling attractive wares, is popular with tourists. Hotels on Jumeirah beach walk host cosmopolitan tourists with ease and delightful modern facilities. 
Serviced Apartments Dubai, in which many global guests prefer to stay while on holiday with family or friends, situated in such readily accessible hotels on Jumeirah beach walk near the sea, welcome valued guests with their wide range of accommodation. 
Such hospitable hotels on Jumeirah beach walk offer savvy guests with options to stay in richly furnished studio standard, studio deluxe, studio deluxe twin and one bedroom deluxe apartments and one bedroom suite with plush furniture and in-room accoutrements, rich drapes and coverings and a lovely view! Endowed liberally with exquisite flower arrangements and luscious fruit platters, smart television and more, they make for a classy and comfortable stay - that is for sure! Ensconced in which, you are bound to have a memorable leisure trip or successful business experience. 
With a well equipped kitchen loaded with all modern home appliances, crockery, cutlery and washing machine, with the elaborately equipped gymnasium readily available for your health regimen or daily work-outs, with an efficient business centre to cater to all your working requirements and a coffee shop where you can amply assuage your hunger pangs at the start of the day, with a hot buffet breakfast, there are also numerous supermarkets from where you can pick delicious "extras" to munch on! 
These serviced apartments Dubai, strategically situated just about half an hour's drive away from the Dubai World centre and both the redline metro station and Ibn Batuta Mall just a short walk away, so you can shop to your heart's content for acclaimed international brands or catch a metro to any part of the fascinating city, are sheer bliss to stay in! 
While the chic studio deluxe twin rooms also boast a balcony with a beautiful view, two twin beds with fine linen, an en-suite bathroom with bathtub on request, safe/locker and iron/ironing board, cable television and broadband internet access at a charge, the luxurious one bedroom suite with elite decor, has an inviting king bed, two twin beds and a provision to add another bed on request. And with a melange of more such stylish options, hospitable and elegant hotels on Jumeirah beach walk offer you an amazing array of modern staying choices as well as the key to happiness!
